name: red trigger
info:
Build a REDTRG msg for tuya_bridge device.

REDTRG values are in range 2000-3000 (convention)

Note: it uses dp 102 (for  [Switch MS-104]). 
Change the code if your tuya-bridge device uses a different dp.

name: send  X TRIGGER
do logging
info:
This node simulate data received from a tuya device. I.e. the output must go to "to logging" input.
Used to build an update message for 'mirror' devices.

Used to process tuyaTRIGGERS.

- `deviceID`: the 'mirror' device ID or CID
- `fakeDP`: the data point id. Convention: user defined, equal to related tuyaTRIGGER, number (1000-2000). 
- `value`: the new value. If the value starts with '@', then it is eval()ued: exemple '@msg.payoad.set' => eval('msg.payoad.set'))

note: The 'mirror' device MUST exist in the `fake` branch of **alldevices**.

name: do mirror msg

label: extra.mirror-devices
info:
This flow contains 

 - some TRIGGER examples
 - all mirror devices on the system

name: converts TUYATRG to device changes
info:
Switch node to select incoming TRIGGER from Tuya (status update)
The selected TUYATRG are converted to device/property/value and sended to tuyaDAEMON ('to logging' link) for standard processing

name: pick and execute
converts SET requests to REDTRG (for Tuya)
info:
For 'mirror' and 'fake' devices:
This custom flow decodes user command relatives to a device:

Based on device(/propery(/value)) this flow can:
  - do local processing
  - send REDTRG to Tuya-cloud
  - produce a WARNING

name: MIRROR DEVICE 'Door_Sensor'
info:
mirror device 'door sensor' input messages

see https://github.com/msillano/tuyaDAEMON/blob/main/devices/Door_Sensor/device_Door_Sensor.pdf

name: MIRROR DEVICE 'PIR_Sensor'
info:
mirror device 'PIR sensor': input messages

see: https://github.com/msillano/tuyaDAEMON/blob/main/devices/PIR_motion/device_PIR_motion.pdf

name: node_red TRIGGERS  examples
info:
A node-red trigger (REDTRGXXXX) is used to fire _smarlife_ automations.

convention: reserved values for REDTRG: 2000-2999

examples: REDTRG2010,  REDTRG2020

name: event selector
asynchronous event TRIGGER exit
info:
TRIGGER buid from tuyaTRIGGER flow and not by tuya-cloud.

Based on local events and conditions, used as accelerators by some user flows.

name: TRIGGER examples and my MIRROR DEVICES (to be costomized)
event TRIGGERS  examples
info:
A node-red trigger (REDTRGXXXX) is used to fire _smarlife_ automations.

convention: reserved values for REDTRG: 2000-2999

examples: REDTRG2010,  REDTRG2020
